lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Following Jester, you make your way back to the Pentamarket, to the outside of the Spark Hammer Smithing. What was previously closed the night before, you can now see the open air smithy is lively and banging. You can hear the slamming of hammer on metal and the shower of sparks from the exterior anvil setup. Currently out there is a halfling man with deeply tanned, red skin, short, black hair and very muscular arms, who currently has leather gloves on, leather apron, and is in the process of forging some kind of long metal blade, hammering it out over a heavy anvil on the outside. There is the trough for the quenching of the blade and then in the interior you can see, a few steps away, the orange glow of the rest of the blacksmith interior. There looks to be somebody else on the inside but you don't get a view of them right now. You can just barely get rows and rows and racks of various pieces of armor and weapons that are currently hanging on display on the inside. There is nobody in the process of walking through at the moment, just in the process of crafting, so you are the only individuals who are holding the space at the moment. So the (metal clanging), turn, (metal clanging).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take my pink bag and I put it down on the table in front of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Metal clanging "Hello?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi! We have things to buy and sell from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm all certainly here for that. What you got? What you looking to buy?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out-- Well it depends, do you have a hand axe that I could buy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sets the hammer into the water, the steam rises up, quenches the blade, takes the gloves off and wipes heavy sweat from the brow. "You're looking for a--?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hand axe! Something that is very sharp and can kill people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I can do." Turns around to the inside of the building and comes back. He has two hand axes, both look pretty well made, one looks a little more intricate than the other, but both are pretty solid. "So we got these two." Throws one and catches it, throws the other and catches it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, put those on the table and then we will look at some other stuff first. Okay! I have six short swords, and I put them down on the table. I've got two daggers here! I've got two hand crossbows! Two light crossbows and two heavy crossbows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You place them all down and looking at the quality and the shininess and the smooth, fresh weaponry that he's placed on the table and the pockmarked, used, damaged, in some cases gnoll mess covered weaponry, you immediately realize-- oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe scrap metal is a good thing for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I say so, these have all seen some use. Not all that great. Sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But also! Also, we have some other things!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cart, we definitely drug here. Definitely around Fjord's neck.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that was around the neck of the manticore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we fucking had them around our necks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you had them in the cart. So you bring them along with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We knew we were going to the blacksmith.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well these here, these are some nice metal."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They were magic."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me have a look at that." He takes them, pulls on the chains, drags for a minute and he inspects them over. "This some real nice craftsmanship, you don't see something this well made. So where did you get this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This giant lion thing with a woman's head had them around it and then we killed the lion thing.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Did you guys bring the cart with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if we got there then yeah, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances past you. Well, the manticore head is still affixed to the cart, by the way. The halfling looks past and he goes, "I'll take it you mean that thing. It's quite scary, well done. Ah, looking at all the weapons. The wood's mostly rotted, unfortunately. Some of the metal can be melted down and reused, have to hammer out all of the imperfections, smelt it all. The manacles look very nice. Tell you what. Give me the lot and the manacles, I'll give you both these axes and be in excess of about 20 gold pieces."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Put that at about 25 gold then, and the one axe."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Works for me.

lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry about that. Yannick. Yannick Dumel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yannick. I'm Jester. It's nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll go get your gold for you."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Packwearer's Provisions, they probably got flasks around there. Well, they probably have some at the Lodge of the Eclipse, that's possible."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, right. That's the more hoity-toity night time tavern here in the Pentamarket."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know about a taxidermist, unfortunately. I'm pretty sure if you ask around you can find someone willing to pay for that. I probably ask the Hall of Erudition, they deal in weird things and strange beasties. Sorry about that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you say the fancy tavern was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lodge of the Eclipse."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lodge of the Eclipse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have seen it before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, how long did you do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A few months.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, I am a tourist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it's on the way sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.text: Is the board between here and there? The job board.

lines.text: The King's Hall is actually not that far from the Archive. It would be a brief detour to get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enthusiasm, Beau,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, fuck.

lines.text: Come on, work on what we did, come on.

lines.text: I don't think Caleb likes me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just try, give it a whirl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be great if you could both take me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Hey, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right this way!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's really scary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just a volume thing sometimes. Okay let's go look--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (louder) He said enthusiasm!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was that not...? Let's go this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Baby steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so where are you heading first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Archive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Archive, okay. On the way another town crier crosses by; another individual, same garb, a middle aged woman, hair pulled back into a very tight bun with the tufts of curled hair around the edges. Same tabard in the front and she's shouting out, "Riot in Rexxentrum squashed for peace! Radical groups brought to justice under the crown!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's some dirty fucking shit.

lines.text: I follow behind her and yell: Town crier has toilet paper stuck to her shoe! (laughter)

lines.text: In the middle of her next line, "Two weeks to--"

lines.text: So you do know what toilet paper is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two weeks' time to the Harvest Close Festival! Victory Pit in the Pentamarket, entry begins in four days!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what did she just say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Harvest Festival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Harvest

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Harvest

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Harvest Close. It's the end of the harvest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's in two weeks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In two weeks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In a fortnight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the Victory Pit in the Pentamarket. Entry begins in four days.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You eventually find your way to the outside of the Archive. Where you had seen was the tapering tower that had the dome, with the polished sun reflection on one side, the rest of it you can see with the intricate carvings that happen with each bit of the spiral as it continues downward. You can see three specific smaller spires that from this perspective make it look like, I would say, almost like a TIE fighter on its side. It has a series of smaller three spires at the base and a central spire that is the mainstay of the library. You can see there's a double door at the base and a number of individuals dressed in deep grey robes with blue sashes, very gray and blue color scheme. As you approach, the outside of it you can see folks entering in and out but as they enter and exit the facility they usually enter and exit under the watch and being escorted by one of these individuals that seem to be members of the Archive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure is pretty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would just like to look around. It's in a square, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's built off of one of the main roads that leads in the direction of where the King's Hall is. So it's not in a major square area, but it's off a large road.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah? Well I am no super spy, but I would like to just look at the area and see what I see in the nature of security, other than these obvious robed figures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ceremonial. It looks like it comes with a ceremonial robe. They're all uniform to a certain extent with some being more intricate and longer with more jewelry and they seem to have a little more station.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you said everyone going in and out was being escorted by one of these individuals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Escorted by one of these, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I see one or two people going in or out what do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them you see appears to be a woman, very well dressed, looks to be a high collar, a buttoned up blouse of some kind, a dress that just barely cuts off right where her ankles hit the ground with very nice shoes. Looks to be a very well off humanoid woman, a human.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she look grumpy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks stoic. Leaves with a very-- (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will follow her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The other one looks to be a man probably in his late 30s or so, also human. He has a cluster of small pieces of parchment that are folded and wadded into his arm and he's leaving like he just was either taking something out or just retrieving something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same fancy type?

lines.text: Less fancy than her, but still more well off than most of the other individuals that have passed through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fancier than me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're all wearing the same thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've lived here for a few months. What do you know about this place?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a lot of books in it and fancy people are super interested in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it easy to gain admittance? Do you know that sort of thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not entirely sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know that they're super into their knowledge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're like "Eh, knowledge, means you're like powerful or something."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's what it means.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knowing's better, yeah, books.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No one immediately seems to pay mind and she's currently eyes on the prize, heading in some direction with earnest intent. The escort, of course, that had helped her out of the Archive stays behind and reenters the building, and she continues on her own, but stays mainly on the main streets; doesn't go and duck into any alleyways very much for her own personal safety during the day and staying out in the open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have any bag, purse, visible necklace, pockets, anything pickable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There do appear to be two small pockets in the front waist part of the blouse and a small satchel that's hanging off the right, over the left shoulder, off the right side of the body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have any chance in hell knowing where she went? Because I start looking around immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, no. That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea. You come back and Nott's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (panicked mumbling)

lines.text: Okay, I look around. Do I see Nott? Kind of haphazardly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going to look around now is what we're doing.

lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.text: I'll go in a pocket, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The front pocket?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said she had two side pockets, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the front of the blouse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Front of the blouse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Front of the blouse or a satchel on her side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do the side satchel.

lines.text: Go ahead and roll sleight of hand, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Higher than ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she still with one of the--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she's alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking and you're concentrating, you watch as the satchel itself lifts and tugs and just tugs. Her head spins around and looks behind her, looks back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I press up against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glances around confused, eyes one of the small pauper children that's off to the side, begging on the side of the road--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scoffs and holds her chin up and then continues walking with a brisker pace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I follow at a brisker pace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another stealth check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth? 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, killed the baby and false imprisonment for the kids.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's how the empire works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, brisker pace, but does not seemed to take notice of your tracking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get a little closer this time and try for one of the pockets this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief moment where you've watched the flap of the blouse open up and expand a bit as the Mage Hand begins to reach in for what is within and then with a slight tug you watch as two of the blouse buttons bounce off and just a bit of the brassiere shows and she closes her shirt real fast and looks about again and turns and what you can see is a man there who's selling apples on a small cart on the side, is maybe two feet from her and goes "Miss?" With the apple and she smacks him right in the face and he, "What was-- what?!" "How

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then holding her shirt closed and bundles up her satchel up in her arms and is now beelining it deeper into the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't let her get away with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're nice buttons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I come back. I did it! I got these two things. They're very nice and round and shiny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're very nice. Where did they come from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A very grumpy person. She was awful. She scowled at children and slapped an innocent man for no reason. She was evil!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check. That is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to insight check her, you've got to make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, maybe she believes it, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe it! She was a horrible person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My itch has been scratched.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel good about everything that just happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the time that Nott was gone could I spot the Allhammer temple? Just so I know where it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or the Platinum House.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately no, the Platinum House nor the Hearth of the Allhammer were noticed. The Hearth of the Allhammer is in the Pentamarket on the northern side and you guys had cut through to get directly to the vicinity of the bathhouse. In the area you are now in the city, you don't have any sort of visual on the Platinum House. As you guys have gathered yourselves together and you make your way towards The Steam's Respite, we're going to take a break! Because it is nine o'clock.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a few minutes, we'll make this as quick of a break as we can so we can jump back in. In the meantime, guys, sit tight, we'll see you again in a few minutes.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone. Welcome back. Thank you for your patience. Once again, you didn't miss anything. Sorry, we didn't have a giveaway this week. We hope to have one up and going real soon from our folks at Wyrmwood. In the meantime, hang tight, you didn't miss anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have shit all over your arm!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I pooped on myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ew, you really are Caleb. What is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not poop, that's where I've had this circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Pocky chocolate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to dad thumb you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Pocky chocolate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's gross.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just fecal matter, it's not like it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, welcome back, guys. Great to have you. You guys coast alongside the road leading towards the Steam's Respite. You catch a glance at the King's Hall. You see a massive structure of bronze and cobalt that is, essentially, the central courthouse of the city. You can see its this massive, tall, single story that stands at least 20 feet high, with long thin windows about every 15 or so feet. The crownsguard presence is pretty thick. You see probably, at first glance, at least ten or so that are watching the front as general sentries. There it is. You do also, at a quick glance, see a ten-foot by five-foot large, heavy piece of wooden board that is standing on its own about four feet from the main entrance to the right. It has a number of pieces of parchment stuck to it. Are you guys continuing on? Head to the bath house? What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take a gander?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got Mr. Memory Board here to scan the thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I just take a quick look at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there people watching the board right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like there's one person scanning past in the process of reading and looking at things as they go. Looks to be a person in basic leather armors. Probably a sellsword of some kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as he walks away, is there anybody, any guards looking at the board?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not directly reading it, but there are, right now, four that are within a 15-foot proximity of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of guards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of guards at this one board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the board's right at the front what is essentially the courthouse center of the entire city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we all hanging back? I'll walk up with Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Works for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a place I can duck away for a second, or is there a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is away from the building, but there's nothing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I walk away from the building, cast Disguise Self on myself and make myself look exactly like Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a shorter version.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But tiny? Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never done this before. I've only seen people do that, so that's what I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The height difference you can create with Disguise Self, I believe, is it a foot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm four-foot tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a four-foot tall Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord Junior.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A perfect replica of Fjord on a smaller scale emerges from the shadows and sidles up alongside you, Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a very focused Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh wow. Like a tiny little Fiesta.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Howdy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you doing a variation of Mother's Love right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I've never used this spell before, so I just did what you did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good. Mistakes that I have made, learn from them. Keep quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say the same.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (softer) Howdy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the board, which you can see has atop of it pressed into the wood the lettering that say Task Board. The heavy, wooden board looks like in immediate view of it, there are maybe eight pieces of paper that are currently stapled to it with various rusted nails that have been reused, and they have been placed onto it, or have been stuck in and then replaced into it. There's probably close to 45 or 50 other rusted nails that are stuck there and have been left that have currently holding nothing to it. You do see through a first glance, both of you, as you look past them, a lot of them are looking for general work helping construction, some are looking for people that want to help reinforce buildings that are crumbling, there are some that are looking for folks that can help shoo away parts of the Outersteads that are encroaching upon the farmlands on the outside of the wall. You do see one that says, "Seeking and paying for any information on Myriad activity in the city."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Cops.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what that is. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one that says, "Reward for information on rebel gatherings and anti-Crown rhetoric."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one that says--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's another that says, "Proof of others' worship of heretical gods paid in gold." One that says, "Looking for work for the glory of our King Bertrand. Good pay and adventurous living as a soldier of the Righteous Brand. Seek Leopold Wanstiker at the Marrow Keep."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wanstiker. Wanstiker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try sleight of hand and just try to make that into Wangstacker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe in you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're all up there now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one seems to notice as you quickly scribble out and alter the visual to where it says "Wangstacker at the Marrow Keep in the Signet Wall," and then, "Roving beast in need of extermination. Must be trained sellsword with experience."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right up our alley! Extermination!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Control action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There looks to be one piece of engraved brass or bronze material on the side that says, "All job inquiries to be taken to Herald of the Hall Voloshin within."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fucking Herald.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you repeat that last phrase please, DM?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, "All job inquiries are to be taken to Herald of the Hall--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Herald of the Hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Voloshin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Voloshin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. V-O-L-O-S-H-I-N.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the guy the town crier said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Personally, I think that we should turn in those devious schemers and get all the gold we can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The last thing we should do is turn on that just for a simple coin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Besides, did you see how many posts on that board were all revolved around ratting people out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I also don't want to stick my neck out, but anything that is a thumb in the eye of the Empire, I'm all for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stitches get-- eh

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Stitches.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Snitches get stitches-- wait--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stitches are just stitches?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the original Zimean--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It makes more sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of the few.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I personally enjoyed the last beast that we slayed, but I think that we have plenty to discuss in that warm bath you're talking about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time for a bath.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk there I talk to Caleb. You mentioned being like "Bah! Empire!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just now or do you mean just a moment ago?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say it in the open, you guys, wait until we're in the bath.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's just mosey onto the bath, nice, slow, and steady.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you put your thumbs in your pocket and give a little waddle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look right on, right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a little tiny mosey--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so cute!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's tiny little Fjord!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a dark mirror, man. A dark, dark mirror.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give a little spit, so people know you're coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (spitting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (tinging)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (western flute trill)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fairly simple looking building, of deeply dark-stained wood slats that are all vertical against heavy load-bearing columns at each major corner, but it's fairly sizeable for its simple exterior.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've learned one thing in my travels: always hit the bathhouse first. Every major town.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Finally, a bath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys walk your way into the main chamber. There's a couple benches to the right and left of you. There's some small planters that have low-light plants being kept in the area to give a fresher scent. There is a small chair and a desk set up with a clerk, an older female half-orc, hunched but smiling with her hair gray, thick hair braided up on the sides and pinned in the back with a long spike of some kind with a lower jaw that extends with two visible tusks, but a warm smile amongst the rest of the nice flower dress that she wears. As you approach, she looks up from the desk. "Hello! You've come to the Respite. I am Miss Rima. Are all of you here for a bath?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Miss Rima!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you like individual rooms?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I think we plan on doing a lot of stuff, so probably all together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, so the Common Room. It is less expensive, but less private. For the six of you, for the Common Chamber, that'll run about three silver apiece."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quite reasonable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rima, is there someone who can take clothing and clean it up as well while we are bathing?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That can be provided at an additional cost, my dear. That'll be an additional one silver each for the washing and cleaning fee."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, happily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll pass on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You probably shouldn't, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's all clean right now. Pumat Sol cleaned him up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can stitch up the holes and stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The clothes are still pretty shit, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you were Prestidigitation-ed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My hair is killer right now. The clothes are old and shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The clothes are cleaner, they're just tattered and patched.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some stink don't come off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew! Like the poop splatter!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The poop is right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Early 90s River Phoenix hair going everywhere of its own volition.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to have my clothes cleaned, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four silver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much." Takes the change, leads you into a back chamber where you get undressed. There is a doorway that leads open into a central common hot spring bath that is dug out of the ground here. It has a rock perimeter to it, and the steam immediately hits you. It smells of herbs and soaps. The water itself is somewhat cloudy, and it looks like there's maybe only four other people in there, obscured by the steam at the edges of the pool. As Miss Rima leaves your presence, you guys can finish disrobing and leaving your clothing behind and enter the bathhouse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go in, and I'm like that drunk person at the hot tub at the hotel. Hi, how are you guys doing? Excuse me! Scoot over! I got more friends coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run by her and say cannonball! And jump in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (water splashing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Told you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the explosion of water hits, there's this older couple in their 70s or so that, as you muscle in, they slowly scoot away. There's this splash and they both (upset squealing) and avoid the space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (elderly voice) My anniversary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come up out of the water, Jester, and (breathes), you hair flaps back on the back of your neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hair like the Little Mermaid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your eyes focus, and you see a familiar face in the water across from you. Leaning, arms akimbo, against the rock, with a thick hilt of a sword just resting, apparently--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the hot tub?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fresh off the east coast!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beast mode!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scoot in a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, hi!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh, hi!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm here! A little sleepy, but I'm here! Oh! Well, if it isn't my old friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, Yasha!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, I've been tracking you guys for quite some time, and I knew you were here, but I just figured I might want to get a bath first and get a rub down. Treat myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man. You come to these places a lot? I've never been.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I enjoy sometimes the finer things of life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She rolled with Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Took you bloody long enough to find us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry. I had some things to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm, for the record, tattooed a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Explain the tattoos.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I apologize that there's no art yet. I'll get around to that. There's a snake tattoo that curls all the way up the arm. That goes all the way up into the peacock-- people have seen the top of the peacock, but the peacock is actually roving into a big floral piece that goes down into a snake that is swallowing the hand. There is an eye in a pyramid piece with another eye illuminated above it. It seems to almost go into the hairline, all the way up the back. There's a moon and sun connected to the shoulder piece that all interconnects. The whole thing's very complicated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it all upper body?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is all upper body, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the Prince Albert?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except for-- do you actually know what that is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She knows a lot about dicks, remember?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I found him in the woods. In a Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Each tattoo has 15 meanings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you been hot on our heels this whole time to keep pace with us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys are not very discreet. You're pretty easy to follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see what happened in Alfield?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Uh, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was us. We killed them all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I came for the aftermath of it, but I didn't see. Or I would have jumped in and helped, of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you following us? And by the way, even though I am totally naked, I still look like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A fully clothed, tiny Fjord. Yeah. Even when you remove your clothing, they just shed off your body and they still visually appear on you. It's a very strange visual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's me, the goblin, by the way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. I do remember you quite well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why were you following us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I said I was going to meet you here in Zadash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We told her where we were going to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. But don't you have mysterious big person things to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did. I have things that I occasionally tend to, and I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you do them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) So mysterious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not that mysterious. I just have things that I have to do sometimes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're looking to get in some--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Trouble?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They paid us 60 gold for three days.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You made 60 gold in three days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed things for money!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never made money like this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got the head of a manticore out on our cart. Melting in the sun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stole two buttons!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. How nice! What do they look like, these buttons?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're in my existing clothes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your other clothing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, are you free of bandages and everything too and we just can't see it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did hear that you've been calling yourselves something? I hear a name floating around, that you're calling yourselves the Mighty Nein?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are getting a reputation!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Word of mouth. You don't need a big, public thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not too much, Caleb. It's all right. Not too much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many people have you heard that from?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three and a half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's less than a handful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three and one dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not even worth mentioning at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a handful of days.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In a handful of days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And is our reputation intimidating? Threatening?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's neither here nor there, but just for clarification, is it Nine, as the number nine--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It's the number nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that's not correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we still need a few people left.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be very hard to search for us if they don't know if it's Nine or Nein.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's Nine, the number nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's deliberately con-- are they looking for nine people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You look different.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was "no."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I have been in this bath for a few minutes. No, you were here when I got here. That's true. We visited an arcane shop and the gentle...men? I'm not sure, really. The proprietors of the shop did a little

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know there's a spell that can do that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. I actually don't know much about spells and things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he gave me the carwash. Took it all away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's something different from where I come from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't like this. I start sinking into the bath, enveloping everything, and sitting on the bottom and holding my breath for a little while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we've lost Caleb. Should we discuss the potential job offers that we've collected?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, if we're going to get him back, we going to have to have an agreement about the fact that, while there's going to be a certain amount of advertising necessary for this kind of venture, there are many of us-- and I think it's fair to say-- that want to keep things quiet. As quiet as possible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree. I am also not looking to attract any attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clapping) You hear this four series of quick snapping claps, and you hear, "Heat it up!" You hear the voice of Miss Rima from within, and you watch as two side doors open. These small troops of women and men come through with these pots of heated water, and then dump them into the bath to refresh the heat, and then exit again and then close the doors behind them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's hot down there on the ears!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I wasn't going to tell you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not in the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not getting in the water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're just standing off to the side, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you're naked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Possibly, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're ready to come in. Come into the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have you been in the water at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'd prefer not to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you not like going into the water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it about it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's creepy. It's dangerous in there. It can drown a person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait. You're creeped out by water and you're creeped out by fire? Man, covering the spectrums. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott, do you know how to swim?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I haven't tried in a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we can certainly teach you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could hold you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's very shallow here. Very little risk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My father just threw me right in. That's how I learned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, that's actually--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not going to do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's a terrible idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that sounds terrifying and horrible!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was awful, but here we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could hold you and you could do the dog paddle. Have you ever seen the dog paddle before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it seems dangerous, though. How do you breathe in there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you keep your head above water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, I take Nott and I say, hold my hands. Just hold my hands. Okay, ready? And I pull Nott into the water and I go: Now kick kick kick! There you go! Kick kick kick! Keep kicking! Keep kicking! Good job! And I put her back on the edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (coughing) It got in my nose!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that brought it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She vomits up a popsicle into the pool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. See?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See? How did it feel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It wasn't terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does the little Fjord look wet or dry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks dry. But leaving a trail of water behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love magic so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are the old couple looking at us like we're weird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. They're both off, holding each other, just going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You might want to get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They immediately get up and start leaving into the changing room, exiting the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anyone else in this pool with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! It's all ours! It's a party room now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think they understood that was an invitation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So here's what we got. We got "gold from 'My-riad' activity?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Myriad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Myriad activity. Whatever that is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's exciting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got "reward for rebel gatherings." Which we are not going to do. We've got "tracking down heretical god worship." I don't think we're feeling that one, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With this one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably a bad thing to do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a god that you worship? Because we've just been told that's it's bad juju around here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Apparently there are only six deities they allow to be worshipped publicly here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are the six deities?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Allhammer, the Raven Queen, the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Platinum Dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Dawnfather, the Annoying Mistress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a different pantheon all together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it? The Dawnfather, the Raven Queen, the Knowing Mistress, the Allhammer--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Lawbearer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Lawbearer!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any sort of religion or tradition of heavy metal or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you in the clear?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Do you worship the Traveler too?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I thought I would have known you if you did.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have really small group meetings. It's usually just me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. He sounds like a great-- so many adventures. With traveling and with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I don't feel like I'm comfortable to say here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can see your vagina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you don't have anything to hide from us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, it's underwater, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're all comfortable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One assumes there's a mist that's just covering everything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It obscures it to the point where, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You stand up and it's still like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, nudity's going great and all, but this is more about comfortability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a victim of Campaign One: yes, there has to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything is a milk bath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not milk!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We also got, apparently, Winestacker. Wang stacker? Yeah, he had something, at the Morrow Keep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wanted people to join the military, so no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're not going to do that. But there is a roving beast, which feel like falls into our wheelhouse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like killing roving beasts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what a wheelhouse is, but I feel pretty positive about the metaphor in general.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, do you want me to wash your hair for you? No one will see. Because you look like Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, that'll be nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're not planning on bouncing

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes I have to go, but I like killing things, so sign me up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, the money.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And my god, the money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never seen anything like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We made so much money off of ears!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, we really did.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just ears alone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three months' worth of shows, like that!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Crownsguard have so much money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they're so lazy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we're going to make a whole lot of gold over at the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is the Pillow Trove?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a fancy hotel place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently Jester's mother's going to hook it up, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who's your mother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's the Ruby of the Sea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I've heard of the Ruby of the Sea.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TALIESIN
lines.text: [whisper inaudibly]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's pretty spectacular that that's your mother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She has her own jingle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does that go again? (singing) Everybody knows the Ruby of the Sea!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) The best lay around!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys have really bad memories because it was not like this at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Nott, now the next step is to get your head underwater. Okay, we're going to take a big breath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been sudsing up your hair. You have to do it to dunk your hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To wash my hair?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau and I will hold you, and on the count of three, we're going to go under.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: One, and a two, and a three!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all go underwater with Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: (bubbling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we bring him back up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping) I'll kill you all! I'll kill every motherfucking one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's done, you are with friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, you did great! You did great. You're going to get a sticker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A sucker, at the end of this. From Jester, not from me, but you'll get a sucker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It didn't burn, right? You lived. Great job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you feel now? Are you still scared?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm less scared, but it's still uncomfortable, and I'd prefer to do it at my own speed, thank you very much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to stand at the side then, and hold the side?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold the side, like this? Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha, there's a heavier presence of the Empire here than there was in Trostenwald. How does that sit with you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I know I have to be careful about some certain things. I think I'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody's chasing after you or giving you any heat, are they?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one? I am lying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally you can say, "Do I believe her?" and then I'll tell you to make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Do I believe her? I do! Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not in trouble for anything. I think, if anything, it would be because of the god I've chosen to follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is whom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the Stormlord. I don't know if you know of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do any of us know what the Stormlord is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. For basic religion, you would, because you've been outside the Empire. Those of you who grew up in the Empire, you would vaguely have an idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about a big reader?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would, maybe. Make a religion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Overseas, safe passage amongst bodies of water, contests of strength, proving worth through action. Lot of very interesting elements that the two of you would know of that following.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand the Stormlord is to be feared and respected.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, he's pulled me out of what literally felt like the depths of hell, so I owe him my life. I will continue to serve him and do as he asks, whenever he asks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you from the Menagerie Coast as well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you from the empire?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you from?! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, Yasha. This is a lot. If you don't want to answer, I understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you just joined back up with us. She doesn't need to tell us her life story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you say "pulled you from hell," though--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, Beau. Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? She brought it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are literally undercutting the very thing I just said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are very glad that you're back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I vouch for her, for what it's worth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which means a lot, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means what it means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I trust her fully.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, what else do you do around a hot bath-spa-place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You run into your friends who are also heading in odd directions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You stand uncomfortably close to people you know and make them feel awkward. And I walk really close to you, Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tend to find it's easier to look into somebody's eyes and figure out if they're lying to you if they're naked and boiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh. Jester-- I forgot what I was going to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha, it's interesting to see you without your cloak. You were super adamant about that one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Hot tub, you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I recall when you asked for it, it was a very cold day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. Do you need a towel? Do you need me to get the hard-to-reach places in your back or anything for you, while we're here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like to think you're scratching-- You've got a sword in your hand, for god's sake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is normal, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You pay extra to keep your weapons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been in the water before, haven't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I know, it just seems to be happening faster than before. It's all fragrant and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Fjord! Are you melting?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's turning into a fish!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you're turning into water!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, oh no. Jester, help. (fake drowning noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five or six days in, I think, and I'm really questioning this decision.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we take the mission to go kill the big beast?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we take the beast. Again, keep it on the down-low. We'll figure out a way of getting credit and keeping our reputation, but keeping it quiet.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We take it to the Herald of the Hall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, I hope his name is Harold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys know how Shakäste was all like (shushing) and secret, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what he was like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he was all like, "I'm mysterious."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We met a guy named Shakäste, he was super cool. White afro, really awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you heard of him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Totally blind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everywhere he went, he was like, (shushing). He was super badass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said "baby" a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He called us "baby."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He called you a baby a lot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But in a charming way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was into it, I didn't feel demeaned by it. It makes me feel good, makes me feel safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I felt demeaned, but in a good way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, maybe we can--

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Be like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get out and I start drying my hair and try to get pretty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys start making your way out of the bath, gathering your clothing once more, as you head back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I gather my clothing away from Jester.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this one still in disguise? Nott, are you still in disguise?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long has it been?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's an hour, that it takes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been in here, catching up and soaking for about a half an hour, 40 minutes, so you're getting pretty close to losing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wrap a towel around myself, and then I'll drop form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, "son."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now see the towel-covered, goblinoid form of Nott, her hair wet and tattered down across the face. It's long in the front, the yellow eyes peeking through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are our clothes in here, or somewhere else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They probably folded them up for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I didn't send mine off to be cleaned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then yours was in a locker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Simple.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to wait until everyone gets out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it. I was going to say, I wait and watch all my friends get out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all just sit on opposite sides.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys coming?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I just want to make sure that I get my full time's worth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we paid a lot for this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we catch you outside, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a really hot hot tub.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the moment's passed for the rest of us. I think we should go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll just go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe they need more hot water, we'll send some in on our way out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have fun storming the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The clean clothing is presented. You guys get dressed and your outfits are waiting for you in the dressing room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm ready for Monster Hunter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who gives up first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm real down for that showdown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in hot tub chicken right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I don't care to show anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like this is a pool of honesty. I just wanted to see everybody else naked first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's honestly kind of my thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm getting out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fun to watch her make her way out using the large greatsword essentially as a walking stick as she emerges from the tub.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get a nice view?

lines.name: MATT, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for perv.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perving on Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now I get out, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Backflip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three-point landing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about midday now, about noon-ish. The rest of the day is still yours. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find a herald. The maudlin herald.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While you guys do that, I need to go to The Pillow Trove, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are you going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to go to The Pillow Trove, which is the nice tavern in the place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you mind, I don't want to go in, but would you mind if I tagged along with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you be gone for a while, or is it a quick errand?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a quick errand. I just need to pop in and pop out, you know how you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see you back over here, then? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, did you want to stick with the others? I'm going to run an errand with Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not for this. I should just be gone a couple of hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need health potions, because you might die?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think chances are very low.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have the one you secured for me, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, Nott, it'll be fine. We'll see if we can meet anybody else who you could make feel better about who they are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go have fun. Maybe you get another button or two from a grumpy person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we leave, I run up and give Yasha a hug, and say: I'm glad you're back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, thank you, Jester. I get uncomfortable. I don't hug her back, but I gently give her one pat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb sees this, and just goes--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hug around the arms that are down, and you're like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm trying. I'm very uncomfortable with human touch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I know you better now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see you back at the King's Hall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okie-dokie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those of you heading to the King's Hall, you make your way back to the familiar outside, this large center for law, order, and judgement within the city of Zadash. As you approach the doorways, the guards pass, but keep an eye very closely as you enter. On the interior, you can see there are two round tables with curved benches that meet the sides of it, and there you can see some of the crownsguard in the process of talking to various civilians and taking notes. There's conversation about-- pardon me. So?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a desk, or a clerk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see a desk or a clerk, but you do see the crownsguard that are currently at the tables, talking to these individuals, and you see two other individual crownsguards that are standing and guarding two hallway entrances that lead further into the King's Hall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk up, I'm going to take my robe, and for the first time any time this party has seen, cross it over and tie it more traditionally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll walk up to one of the king's guard, ask him. We're here to inquire about one of the postings. There's a roving beast that needs taking care of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're inquiring about the job board?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. We're a few members of the group known as the Mighty Nein. We would like to take one of those listings off your hand, if we could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Which one in the task board you looking for?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seems about our speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Let me go ahead and pull this out." He pulls a small side bag that has a bunch of pieces of paper in it. He unfurls one section, sets it down. "And your names?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't we all go under The Mighty Nein?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, but for the purposes of maintaining organization within the paperwork here we need to know the names of those who are to claim any rewards or benefits of completing a job."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm Philbin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Philbin, all right. And you are?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Regis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it, I can't say it now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lawrence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lawrence."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kylre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kylre."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Esma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Esma, all right."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Short for Barrymore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's short for Barrymore, but I just go by Barry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The head-shake afterward is the best

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! D&D Beyond! Am I remembering how to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What screen are you on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm still new.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Refreshing! What did you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Refreshing, it's loading.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ashley, that's DocuSign, you're in the wrong app completely!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really, oh wow, that's a number.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a minus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a minus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This here is a writ of Lawmaster intent. This will "give you entrance to the location of where the job is supposed to take place. This supposed creature "has holed up in a sewer nexus right on where the Interstead Sprawl meets with the outer wall of the "Tri-Spires. We need you to travel down there, and, well, let's say there's a whole region on the "inside where we've been hearing about this backing up of various liquid and strange noises from "cleaners who were making their way through, so we sent a few crownsguards down and came across a "mass of congealed sewage slime and webbing, so the

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 700 gold pieces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's correct."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for the entrance, they are aware that there are several of us, we are just representatives of a slightly larger group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you have to divide it evenly from the 700 you get."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course, but we can all get entrance from this writ?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All the ones that are named on here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You need all the names of everybody involved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's more involved?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're called the Mighty "Nine," aren't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) Takes the writ. "And who are the other companions?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's just send seven of us down for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven of nine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, really? I've never felt such hatred than this moment. Wow, god damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are those other two called? I forget.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've got Karen--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Karen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Rothschild.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Karen and Rothschild."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Wouldn't that mean we would get 900 gold? 100 per person-- per, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that would be 700 gold, split between the lot of you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just to be clear, there's no clearage of sewage? We're just here to take care of whatever's causing that webbing you mentioned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever's causing the blockage, and the webbing, whatever else they found down there. Yes, "take care of that, bring back proof of the death."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Proof of-- okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you don't know what did it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know what kind of monster it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No fucking clue, that's why you're being paid 700 gold for it!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Have people been killed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "People have gone missing. You think you're the first to try and take the job? No, it's "dangerous! That's why we're paying so much. If you don't want it, go away. If you want it, here's the "writ, good luck."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mighty obliged, we'll take care of this most expediently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait! Has anyone gone and come back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There have been three times that it's been taken up and one's come back declining it and two "that have not."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Declining it? For any specific reason or did they just change their mind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Think they changed their mind a bit."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll take care of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure you will."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I sense a little sarcasm in you, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a dwarven thing. We've got resting bitch voice." (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good day to you. We'll take care of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great. Well, shove off!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Theoretically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that I want to be a-- what's the word-- "shysta"?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shyster.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Shakäste.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they don't know what the monster is, and we have a perfectly good manticore head--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then they're going to send people down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not really our problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But then they'll know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we get the gold first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe it came back to life?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As someone who actually has towns that they can't re-enter again for reasons, that we will go into later, over booze-- it's best to keep a clear reputation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau does have a good point, though. I mean, if we get down there and it's some world-ending monster--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can just run back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We found a manticore, who knows, they make nests.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a blacksmith who knows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think the blacksmith cares what the Empire is doing? The blacksmith is just trying to survive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the blacksmith will get ten gold for telling them if they find out there was a manticore down there that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If the blacksmith knows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a good plan B.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's an emergency plan. It's a good plan B, I'll grant you that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I head to the outside and wait out by the posting where we last saw Caleb and Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Karen and Rothschild.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Karen and Rothschild.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to juggle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's nearest to you opens in the direction of the Pentamarket, and while the portcullis is lifted you see there are two crownsguard there, currently standing with spears and shields at the ready. A horse-drawn carriage clomps by you and makes its way inside. You guys approach and one of the guards steps forward. "Can I help you, please?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we have business at the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think you do. Please, shove off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, I have business at the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's your business with the Pillow Trove?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a package that's being delivered there. What business do you have at the Pillow Trove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, your friend here looks like he just wandered out of the Evening Nip if anything, so it would be best--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes, I hired him to protect me because you know I'm very fragile and delicate, but if he doesn't look well enough to be my guard, you're welcome to walk me instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other. Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! (exclamation of surprise)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at each other, look back at you. "All right, I'll walk you in. Briefly. Then I'll get back to my post. You, stay the fuck out of this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Sorry, Caleb. I'll let you know what it's like, okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rejected!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Frumpkin, kitty, kitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, to the Pillow Trove. This way, follow me." The other guard steps past him and blocks you from the other two. As the guard guides you in he makes a big whistle sound, does a finger loop, and you watch as another guard gets relieved and comes down to help him at the front doorway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are really on top of your shit in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. I appreciate that." Now, stepping into the Tri-Spires--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that happen lickety-split, the second guard comes down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the district where the elite live, where the elite work, and where folk of very specific visual presentation and purpose are allowed entry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, and as she goes and does her thing, I just want you to know that Frumpkin does follow her, and I leave and walk around the block, and duck into an alley, or any private place, and cast Disguise Self on myself to make myself look very resplendent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For Frumpkin? It's not very good. That is only a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin begins to (meowing) run on its way, and one of the guards goes, "Piss off," and kicks Frumpkin about ten feet off, and stumbles and skids, and then gets back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Not okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that take any damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say take one point of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you said one point?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled hit points for him when I made him, and it was one, so he's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (explosion)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You kicked his cat into oblivion!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You kicked his cat until it burst!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He kicked his cat so hard!

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: He kicked the highlights out of his hair!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's laughing now, Billy? Who's laughing now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stray cats can't just wander into--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb curses to himself and wanders around, and does what he says, suddenly looking very noble. I'll let that go and then I'll follow up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that isn't a beer-worthy story, I don't know what is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody punch me. (punching sound)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard looks a bit confused. As you wander back, he's pointing at the tip of his boot, and he's like, "I don't know, it was fucking crazy." So what do you look like?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am wearing the deepest black robes, and I have a black goatee. Very Evil David Hasselhoff.
