lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Master from Doctor Who.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks very embroidered and everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all black velvet. The way the audience thinks Vax looks, that's what I look like right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kneel before Zod.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a meeting in 20 minutes at the Pillow Inn. I don't know what it's called, but Caleb does. I don't remember shit, but Caleb says whatever the name of it is, because of my feat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the smartest feat you've ever taken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course it is, it was chosen very specifically. I say whatever it's called--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember, he does. I have a meeting in 20 minutes at the Pillow Grove-- I know that's wrong-- Right now, 20 minutes, I need to get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both blink their eyes at you. As you glance down to look at your hand, it's your regular sleeve.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The spell didn't work here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, magic shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a sense now, you think back to the air of magical longevity the spell would maintain, it's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disguise Self?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he used Disguise Self.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they dispelled it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At some point, as you approached and then walked up to the gate, your Disguise Self just dissipated. The one guard that was there before is like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I just walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk away, he just goes, "Yeah, that's what I thought."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cat kicker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Quick meeting, right? Quick fucking meeting."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a dick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just made some guard's night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got to kill that guard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are escorted to the exterior of the Pillow Trove, which would be over here in the Tri-Spires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder how much of the Tri-Spires is like this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's got to be locked up--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's fancy pants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a couple of quick spins, you see one that catches your eye, which is really interesting, this massive one of the Tri-Spire towers that's closest to the vicinity of The Pillow Trove, looks like it was this old temple that's been completely hollowed out and re-purposed to look like a glitzy casino. There are banners that are pulled across in brightly-colored silks that mingle and braid into each other. You can see on each different floor there's a different tone to the stone that's been slightly altered, and you can see signs showing different forms of entertainment. It's simultaneously historically awe-inspiring and gaudy combination that is intriguing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like Caesar's Palace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. It's a little Vegas-y, compared to the rest of this area. You can see a lot of the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's clouds painted on the ceiling for no reason.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the corners of these roads, you can see these tall lanterns that contain a very faintly ever-burning flame. Between each of them, there's a long, white, silken banner that hangs as part of decoration along each road. The roads themselves feel like they're always in some loose parade-type celebration, that's just part of the decor of the vicinity. The stark contrast between the Outersteads, to even the moderately average Innersteads, to the Tri-Spires is astronomical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask the guard: What is that building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you not been here before?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm new to town, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you're looking at right there is called the Triumph Chime. It's got all sorts of bars, gambling halls, inn rooms, brothel, everything you need up here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow. I didn't think you had things like this in the Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've got them in places. What, you think we're uncivilized folk? Where are you from?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nicodranas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh. Well, you'll feel right at home, yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, here you are. Pillow Trove." As he motions over to the side, you see this luxurious inn that has this cylindrical appearance to the front and then turns into a blocky building behind. It has this gold and deep purple coloration to the pillars that hold up the various walls to each intersection, and as soon as you walk inside, the scents of scented candles and various lavender-type smells hit your nose. The element of it reminds you of home. As you walk inside, there's a beautiful semi-circle desk, and a human woman, probably in her mid-20s or so, jet black hair that's straight and dangles past her shoulders, watches you approach, as the guard says, "I'll wait here and escort you out when you're done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you very much, kind sir! I walk grandiosely up to the woman. Hello. I have a package that's being delivered to here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. What is the name receiving?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I shall inquire. I'll be back here in just a moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she leaves from the front desk, you can see there are two crownsguard that are assigned to the sides that are keeping a close watch on you, but they're lackadaisy through their day. You get the sense they probably don't have to work too hard this side of the city. About five minutes pass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody watching me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he walks past, he goes, "Ah. Good day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He exits the building. Another five minutes pass, and eventually the woman comes back and she goes, "I'm sorry, we don't have a package for that name here. Is there any other it might be under?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe under Lavorre?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll check."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes back after that, "I'm sorry, there's nothing under that name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything from The Ruby of the Sea, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll check one more time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leaves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I smile back at the guard, like (pained laugh) this is crazy, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She comes back out. "I'm terribly sorry, we do not have a package for or under any of those names.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's really weird. Okay. Well, tell you what, how about, because it's probably going to be coming, you know, I'm here really early for it, you know-- so if it comes for me-- when it does-- could you leave word with the guard outside the Tri-Spire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guard house, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. All right, okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I can come and ask if it's been delivered and then I can come, because I don't want to have to walk all the way here, you know, if it's not here for me yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I'll make a note of it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Unless I should maybe stay here, waiting for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you like, we could set you up with a room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Yes, how much would that be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pricing begins at ten gold per room for the basic suites, 20 for the next tier up, and for the diplomatic ones, those run about 50 gold a night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I normally stay in the diplomatic rooms, but I guess the smallest room because, you know, I'm small.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Ten gold per night, how long do you plan to stay?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably just tonight, because it'll probably be here in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. That was Jester, right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, here you go, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, and here is the key to your room."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Second floor, third door on the left, it should be number 12."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12, that's my favorite number!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So sorry I couldn't be of help with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I go upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get into your room. The door opens, it's a beautiful small room, but well decorated and a nice queen-size canopy bed and a dresser with a mirror, a chair, a little--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mini-fridge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wet bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know where I'm staying tonight, Traveler, I might be here, I might be with my friends, but-- Okay, I'll see you soon, okay! And I run back out of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn and in the hallway to where you entered, you see a familiar cloak of deep green, hooded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloak nods down towards you and the voice slowly cascades out from underneath, "I'm so sorry she's not aware that you're here now, but you're with friends."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Do you think you could help me, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Child, I think I help you quite a bit already."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. You do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you need?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how to let her know-- I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans forward and the hand reaches out and takes your chin a little bit and holds it there. There in the dark space of the hood, you can see the familiar verdant irises looking back and the warmth fills you once more, the comfort that kept you comfortable so many years alone in that room. "I think the more deeds you do, the more lives you change, the more confident brats you break-- She'll find you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I pull out the pamphlet. Look what I made for you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. Adorable."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: People are going to worship you like crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know what to do, then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay. I missed you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm never far."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched) All right, I'm going to walk, if you want to follow me, I'm going to go over here then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look down at the pamphlet and look up to say that, he's gone. You hear this faint little (chuckles).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I skip away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Skip away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go back to the guard. Okay, I have a room here. I don't know if you need to escort me anymore because I'm staying here at The Pillow Trove, but I'm going to go, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Um, all right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, guard, what's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reeve."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reeve, it's so nice to meet you, I'm Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had his hand out, looks like he's expecting some sort of a tip--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I shake it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, so that guy that I hired to guard me, I gave him some money. What am I supposed to do, am I allowed to get him in here so he can actually do his job?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's not an interior guard. Based on his markings, it looks like he's supposed to be at the perimeter."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy that was all in his tattered coat and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! I misunderstood."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's not coming in."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I hired him to guard me, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, we have to maintain a certain kind of presentation here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly, could I have asked around and found my way to the other entrance to this area by now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or to a Banana Republic, maybe? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have this. Super quick: a single question at the gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in this time you could have made your way around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ask around, find my way there. All right, so I walk up straight, looking like me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, may I have a word of your time-- may I have a moment of your time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Piss off."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen to me, there is a store in here called Chastity's Nook that sells dirty books. I have heard of it for months, and I am going to shop at this store, and if you want to make three gold-- and if this one wants to make three gold-- you will let me in there to shop for smut at the store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as his face-- His eyes go wide for a second and he goes, "You're a fan of the Chastity Nook?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You hear that?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One, two, three. One, two, three, each of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The guard's a critter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, for six gold, you could buy yourself some real fancy clothes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate what you're trying to do, pay off a Crownsguard of the city of Zadash to let you, a lowlife from the skids of the town, in the most expensive and most well-guarded region of the city. I like my job, I like my head."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, enjoy working for the man. I walk off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Anarchy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boom!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I go back to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys meet up on the outside of the district.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was really pretty in there. People are kind of stupid, but I did talk to the Traveler, so everything's cool. Also, I don't have any money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay, I have a little bit of money, do you need some?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I mean I have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have about 50 gold, do you want me to give you some?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so stupid, though!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a lot of money!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's more money than my parents ever made in their entire life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I made, like, every day for my allowance!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In full view of Jester, I reach into my pocket and take what's left of the mud and just-- Then I storm off towards our original shitty inn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb! I didn't mean to make you put your shit on your face again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't hear that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys jaunt off to catch up with the rest of the troop, meeting probably-- because you guys would probably be heading back to The Leaky Tap. You manage to gather in the center of the common area. You see a freshly-muddied Caleb enter with a somewhat flustered, but smiling, Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey-- oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Hi-- oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're clean, we're relaxed, we're ready to go into a sewer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fitting, absolutely fitting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How did-- didn't you just--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is his normal look-- I think it's very nice, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do, too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where are we going again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like you. Do you want to hang with us for a while?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this day is great!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll take it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, let's go kill something, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to the outer wall of the Tri-Spire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By now, I'd say it's probably closer to three in the afternoon--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's beast killing time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's beast killing time, yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time to eat some roast beast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe a late lunch, carb up, and then let's fucking--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's carb up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pot roast beast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guess what, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a room at The Pillow Trove.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would you get a room at The Pillow Trove?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, because my package didn't come, so I thought that maybe if I got a room there, then I can check in in the morning as well, maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's very clever, actually. Well done. Are you still expecting your package?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's been not enough time, I don't think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes I expect things to show up and then they don't. It can be very disappointing, but it's all right. I'm sure it'll show up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll show up, of course it will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that it matters if it doesn't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The trick is to not expect anything in life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't expect you to say that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good advice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then you'll never be disappointed, you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, here's to abandoning expectations!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Abandoning expectations!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did we get these drinks? (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On the way home from the airport!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taking a little bit of liquid courage as you muster your weaponry and gather your way to the direction to the entry of the sewer where the currently acquired mercenary contract had been taken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we enter, Beau says: Wait, should we have done research on what we're fighting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nah, we'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's go! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Send all of your complaints for not knowing what would happen in the porno shop to @matthewmercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just got to get some fancy clothes, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just waiting for the drop to look at the shoes and you look back and yep, no, those shoes don't get in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to figure out how to get rid of the Disguise Self blockage, that's a big-- What caused that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go over the wall, around the wall, under the wall--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, there are sewers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The place is crawling with--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's a vicinity thing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We will get you porn, Liam. We will get you porn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smut you shall have!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree, I think you just need a nice coat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to get to that shop, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A nice coat can get you porn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please continue to try! Not every means to an end is the easiest and most straightforward, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When I was young, we would stack three up and put on a coat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got reasons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for watching. Those I'll see in Kentucky, I'll see you soon. Oh, boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take care of my boy, home-state. Be good to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be back next week, with Ashley.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Excited to have you home for a little longer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! Just a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I missed you. There was something else I was supposed to talk about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you were supposed to say something about giveaways or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What were you supposed to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway. I'll put it on Twitter if I remember what it was. Anyway, love you guys, take care of yourselves, we'll see you next week, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It still is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had a bathhouse episode! [music]
